field_body.value:
Hero Component is the first CTA and most important component of any landing page. It can be treated as a banner when only a single media image is added. If multiple images are added, this is converted to the slider.

Hero component consists of: 

  • Title
  • Short title
  • Media image
  • Subhead
  • Summary
  • Link 

All the text components (title, short title, summary) are placed on the bottom of the Hero image. The Ezcontent gives a lot of flexibility to the editor to choose the background text color, an indentation of the text. An editor can also rearrange the slides by simple drag and drop.

Please refer to the video below.

Link is converted into a button, which serves as CTA button on the landing pages
